channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Expresso and SIC, 8–14 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 6–7 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 9–11 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (GUE/NGL): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Expresso and SIC, 8–14 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Expresso and SIC, 8–14 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 25.7–31.3%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 38.5–44.6%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 6.2–9.5%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 5.3–8.4%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (Greens/EFA): 5.9–9.1%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (GUE/NGL): 0.9–2.4%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 2–5 March 2018 – Seat Projections
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 5–7 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 8–10 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–3 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 0–1 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (Greens/EFA): 1–2 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 2–5 March 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 2–5 March 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 23.5–30.6%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 35.4–43.1%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 7.8–12.6%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 3.9–7.6%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (Greens/EFA): 5.6–9.8%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 3–6 February 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 3–6 February 2018 – Voting Intentions

  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 6.8–11.3%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 4.5–8.4%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (Greens/EFA): 5.8–10.0%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Expresso and SIC, 14–17 January 2018 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
